SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.* , rownum as rnum FROM (SELECT row_number()OVER(ORDER BY seq ASC) as rown ,seq, model_code, model_name, filename, to_char(write_date , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as write_date, make_comp, state_chk FROM phonemodel) A ) B
WHERE #startNum# <= rnum AND rnum <= #endNum#
ORDER BY rown DESC

SELECT B.* FROM(SELECT rownum as rown, A.* , rownum as rnum FROM (SELECT count(*) as cnt, MODEL_NAME, filename, c.MODEL_CODE, p.make_comp, to_char(p.open_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as open_date FROM PHONEMODEL p join CUSTOMINFO c ON p.MODEL_CODE = c.MODEL_CODE
WHERE #s_sdate# <= p.open_date AND p.open_date <= #s_edate#
GROUP BY MODEL_NAME,filename, c.MODEL_CODE, p.make_comp, p.open_date ORDER BY cnt DESC) A ) B
WHERE #startNum# <= rnum AND rnum <= #endNum#

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT count(*) as cnt, MODEL_NAME, filename, c.MODEL_CODE, p.make_comp, to_char(p.open_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as open_date FROM PHONEMODEL p join CUSTOMINFO c ON p.MODEL_CODE = c.MODEL_CODE GROUP BY MODEL_NAME,filename, c.MODEL_CODE, p.make_comp, p.open_date ORDER BY cnt DESC) A
WHERE #s_sdate# <= open_date AND open_date <= #s_edate#

SELECT B.* FROM(SELECT rownum as rown, A.* , rownum as rnum FROM (SELECT count(*) as cnt, MODEL_NAME, filename, c.MODEL_CODE, p.make_comp, to_char(p.open_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as open_date FROM PHONEMODEL p join CUSTOMINFO c ON p.MODEL_CODE = c.MODEL_CODE
WHERE #s_sdate# <= p.open_date AND p.open_date <= #s_edate#
GROUP BY MODEL_NAME,filename, c.MODEL_CODE, p.make_comp, p.open_date ORDER BY cnt DESC) A ) B
